blocks.name: cnei
blocks.content: Extend class notation with neighborhood relation for topologies.
blocks.origin: const class cnei { nei }

blocks.name: diff.cnei.s
diff.cnei.c
diff.cnei.w
df-nei
blocks.content: Define a function on topologies whose value is a map from a subset to its neighborhoods. (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-nei(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cnei, cmpt(s0, ctop, cmpt(s1, cpw(cuni(cv(s0))), crab(s2, cpw(cuni(cv(s0))), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-nei(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ nei =(s0 ∈ Top ↦(s1 ∈ P(⋃ s0)↦ { s2 ∈ P(⋃ s0)| ∃(s3 ∈ s0,(s1 ⊆ s3 ∧ s3 ⊆ s2))}))
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: neifval
blocks.content: Value of the neighborhood function on the subsets of the base set of a topology. (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm neifval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(cnei, c0), cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crab(s1, cpw(c1), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(cnei, c0), cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crab(s1, cpw(c1), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))), diffsc(s2, c1))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(cnei, c0), cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crab(s1, cpw(c1), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crab(s1, cpw(c1), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), universe))
  3syl(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crab(s1, cpw(c1), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), universe), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cpw(c1), universe))
  topopn(c0, c1)
  pwexg(c1, c0)
  mptexg(s0, cpw(c1), universe, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, ctop, cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crab(s1, cpw(c1), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), universe, cnei, cmpt(s0, cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))), crab(s1, cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))), wrex(s2, cv(hs0), wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))), crab(s1, cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))), wrex(s2, cv(hs0), wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), cpw(c1), crab(s1, cpw(c1), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rabeqbidv(s1, cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))), cpw(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s2, cv(hs0), wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
  pweqd(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  rexeq(s2, cv(hs0), c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))
  df-nei(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crab(s1, cpw(c1), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, cuni(cv(hs0)))
  diff.cuni.s(s1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm neifval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Top →(nei ` c0)=(s0 ∈ P(c1)↦ { s1 ∈ P(c1)| ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ⊆ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))}))
  ⊣ c1 = ⋃ c0
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ Top →(nei ` c0)=(s0 ∈ P(c1)↦ { s1 ∈ P(c1)| ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ⊆ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))})), d(s2, c1))
  mpdan(c0 ∈ Top, (nei ` c0)=(s0 ∈ P(c1)↦ { s1 ∈ P(c1)| ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ⊆ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))}), (s0 ∈ P(c1)↦ { s1 ∈ P(c1)| ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ⊆ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))})∈ 𝕌)
  3syl(c0 ∈ Top, (s0 ∈ P(c1)↦ { s1 ∈ P(c1)| ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ⊆ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))})∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ c0, P(c1)∈ 𝕌)
  topopn(c0, c1)
  pwexg(c1, c0)
  mptexg(s0, P(c1), universe, { s1 ∈ P(c1)| ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ⊆ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))})
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, ctop, (s0 ∈ P(c1)↦ { s1 ∈ P(c1)| ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ⊆ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))}), universe, cnei, (s0 ∈ P(⋃ hs0)↦ { s1 ∈ P(⋃ hs0)| ∃(s2 ∈ hs0,(s0 ⊆ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))}))
  mpteq12dv(s0, P(⋃ hs0), { s1 ∈ P(⋃ hs0)| ∃(s2 ∈ hs0,(s0 ⊆ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))}, P(c1), { s1 ∈ P(c1)| ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ⊆ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))}, hs0 = c0)
  rabeqbidv(s1, P(⋃ hs0), P(c1), hs0 = c0, ∃(s2 ∈ hs0,(s0 ⊆ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1)), ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ⊆ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1)))
  pweqd(⋃ hs0, c1, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr(⋃ hs0, c1, ⋃ c0, hs0 = c0)
  unieq(hs0, c0)
  rexeq(s2, hs0, c0, (s0 ⊆ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))
  df-nei(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ P(c1)↦ { s1 ∈ P(c1)| ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ⊆ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))}))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, ⋃ hs0)
  diff.cuni.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: neif
blocks.content: The neighborhood function is a function from the set of the subsets of the base set of a topology. (Contributed by NM, 12-Feb-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm neif(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wfn(cfv(cnei, c0), cpw(c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, ctop), wfn(cfv(cnei, c0), cpw(c1)), wfn(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c1), crab(hs2, cpw(c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))), cpw(c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctop), wfn(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c1), crab(hs2, cpw(c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))), cpw(c1)), wral(hs0, cpw(c1), wcel(crab(hs2, cpw(c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), universe)))
  ralrimivw(hs0, cpw(c1), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(crab(hs2, cpw(c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), universe))
  3syl(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(crab(hs2, cpw(c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), universe), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cpw(c1), universe))
  topopn(c0, c1)
  pwexg(c1, c0)
  rabexg(hs2, cpw(c1), universe, wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))
  fnmpt(hs0, cpw(c1), crab(hs2, cpw(c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), universe, cmpt(hs0, cpw(c1), crab(hs2, cpw(c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c1), crab(hs2, cpw(c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))))
  fneq1d(cfv(cnei, c0), cpw(c1), cmpt(hs0, cpw(c1), crab(hs2, cpw(c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  neifval(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, ctop))
  diff.hs2.c(cpw(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm neif(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Top →(nei ` c0)[Fn]P(c1))
  ⊣ c1 = ⋃ c0
} = {
  mpbird(c0 ∈ Top, (nei ` c0)[Fn]P(c1), (hs0 ∈ P(c1)↦ { hs2 ∈ P(c1)| ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⊆ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆ hs2))})[Fn]P(c1))
  syl(c0 ∈ Top, (hs0 ∈ P(c1)↦ { hs2 ∈ P(c1)| ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⊆ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆ hs2))})[Fn]P(c1), ∀(hs0 ∈ P(c1), { hs2 ∈ P(c1)| ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⊆ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆ hs2))} ∈ 𝕌))
  ralrimivw(hs0, P(c1), c0 ∈ Top, { hs2 ∈ P(c1)| ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⊆ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆ hs2))} ∈ 𝕌)
  3syl(c0 ∈ Top, { hs2 ∈ P(c1)| ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⊆ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆ hs2))} ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ c0, P(c1)∈ 𝕌)
  topopn(c0, c1)
  pwexg(c1, c0)
  rabexg(hs2, P(c1), universe, ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⊆ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆ hs2)))
  fnmpt(hs0, P(c1), { hs2 ∈ P(c1)| ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⊆ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆ hs2))}, universe, (hs0 ∈ P(c1)↦ { hs2 ∈ P(c1)| ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⊆ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆ hs2))}))
  eqid((hs0 ∈ P(c1)↦ { hs2 ∈ P(c1)| ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⊆ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆ hs2))}))
  fneq1d((nei ` c0), P(c1), (hs0 ∈ P(c1)↦ { hs2 ∈ P(c1)| ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⊆ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆ hs2))}), c0 ∈ Top)
  neifval(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ Top)
  diff.hs2.c(P(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(P(c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: neiss2
blocks.content: A set with a neighborhood is a subset of the base set of a topology. (This theorem depends on a function's value being empty outside of its domain, but it will make later theorems simpler to state.) (Contributed by NM, 12-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm neiss2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wss(c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
} = {
  elpwid(c2, c3, wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wcel(c2, cpw(c3)), wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(cnei, c0))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(cnei, c0))))
  elfvdm(c1, cfv(cnei, c0), c2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wb(wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(cnei, c0))), wcel(c2, cpw(c3))))
  eleq2d(c2, cdm(cfv(cnei, c0)), cpw(c3), wcel(c0, ctop))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cdm(cfv(cnei, c0)), cpw(c3)), wfn(cfv(cnei, c0), cpw(c3)))
  neif(c0, c3)
  fndm(cfv(cnei, c0), cpw(c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm neiss2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))→ c2 ⊆ c3)
  ⊣ c3 = ⋃ c0
} = {
  elpwid(c2, c3, (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)))
  mpbid((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)), c2 ∈ P(c3), c2 ∈ dom((nei ` c0)))
  adantl(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), c2 ∈ dom((nei ` c0)))
  elfvdm(c1, (nei ` c0), c2)
  adantr(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), (c2 ∈ dom((nei ` c0))↔ c2 ∈ P(c3)))
  eleq2d(c2, dom((nei ` c0)), P(c3), c0 ∈ Top)
  syl(c0 ∈ Top, dom((nei ` c0))= P(c3), (nei ` c0)[Fn]P(c3))
  neif(c0, c3)
  fndm((nei ` c0), P(c3))
}

blocks.name: neival
blocks.content: Value of the set of neighborhoods of a subset of the base set of a topology. (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm neival(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c2), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), c1), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c2), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), c1)))
  fveq1d(cfv(cnei, c0), c1, cmpt(hs0, cpw(c2), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  neifval(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c2)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c2), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), wcel(c1, cpw(c2)), wcel(crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), universe))
  biimpar(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cpw(c2)))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctop), wb(wcel(c1, cpw(c2)), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, c0))
  elpw2g(c2, c0, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), universe))
  3syl(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), universe), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cpw(c2), universe))
  topopn(c0, c2)
  pwexg(c2, c0)
  rabexg(s0, cpw(c2), universe, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  fvmptg(hs0, c1, cpw(c2), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), universe, cmpt(hs0, cpw(c2), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  rabbidv(s0, cpw(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  rexbidv(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wa(wss(c1, cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  cleq1lem(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c2), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))

thm neival(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)→((nei ` c0)` c1)= { s0 ∈ P(c2)| ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ s0))})
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(((nei ` c0)` c1), { s0 ∈ P(c2)| ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ s0))}, ((hs0 ∈ P(c2)↦ { s0 ∈ P(c2)| ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⊆ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ s0))})` c1), (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  adantr(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c2, ((nei ` c0)` c1)=((hs0 ∈ P(c2)↦ { s0 ∈ P(c2)| ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⊆ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ s0))})` c1))
  fveq1d((nei ` c0), c1, (hs0 ∈ P(c2)↦ { s0 ∈ P(c2)| ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⊆ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ s0))}), c0 ∈ Top)
  neifval(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c2)
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), ((hs0 ∈ P(c2)↦ { s0 ∈ P(c2)| ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⊆ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ s0))})` c1)= { s0 ∈ P(c2)| ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ s0))}, c1 ∈ P(c2), { s0 ∈ P(c2)| ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ s0))} ∈ 𝕌)
  biimpar(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c2, c1 ∈ P(c2))
  syl(c0 ∈ Top, (c1 ∈ P(c2)↔ c1 ⊆ c2), c2 ∈ c0)
  elpw2g(c2, c0, c1)
  adantr(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c2, { s0 ∈ P(c2)| ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ s0))} ∈ 𝕌)
  3syl(c0 ∈ Top, { s0 ∈ P(c2)| ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ s0))} ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ c0, P(c2)∈ 𝕌)
  topopn(c0, c2)

  rabexg(s0, P(c2), universe, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ s0)))
  fvmptg(hs0, c1, P(c2), { s0 ∈ P(c2)| ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ s0))}, universe, (hs0 ∈ P(c2)↦ { s0 ∈ P(c2)| ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⊆ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ s0))}), { s0 ∈ P(c2)| ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⊆ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ s0))})
  rabbidv(s0, P(c2), hs0 = c1, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⊆ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ s0)), ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ s0)))
  rexbidv(s1, c0, hs0 = c1, (hs0 ⊆ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ s0), (c1 ⊆ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ s0))
  cleq1lem(hs0, c1, s1, s1 ⊆ s0)
  eqid((hs0 ∈ P(c2)↦ { s0 ∈ P(c2)| ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⊆ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ s0))}))

  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)

thm isnei(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)))), wcel(c3, crab(hs0, cpw(c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))))
  eleq2d(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1), crab(hs0, cpw(c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)))
  neival(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wb(wcel(c3, crab(hs0, cpw(c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))))))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c3, crab(hs0, cpw(c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)))), wa(wcel(c3, cpw(c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)))))
  elrab(hs0, c3, cpw(c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c3, cv(s0))
  anbi1d(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c3, cpw(c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))), wss(c3, c2))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctop), wb(wcel(c3, cpw(c2)), wss(c3, c2)), wcel(c2, c0))
  topopn(c0, c2)
  elpw2g(c2, c0, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

thm isnei(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)→(c3 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1)↔(c3 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c3)))))
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), c3 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1), (c3 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c3))), c3 ∈ { hs0 ∈ P(c2)| ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ hs0))})
  eleq2d(c3, ((nei ` c0)` c1), { hs0 ∈ P(c2)| ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ hs0))}, (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  neival(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2)
  adantr(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c2, (c3 ∈ { hs0 ∈ P(c2)| ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ hs0))} ↔(c3 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c3)))))
  syl5bb(c0 ∈ Top, c3 ∈ { hs0 ∈ P(c2)| ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ hs0))}, (c3 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c3))), (c3 ∈ P(c2)∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c3))))
  elrab(hs0, c3, P(c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ hs0)), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c3)))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, hs0 = c3, (c1 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ hs0), (c1 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c3))
  anbi2d(hs0 = c3, c1 ⊆ s0, s0 ⊆ hs0, s0 ⊆ c3)
  sseq2(hs0, c3, s0)
  anbi1d(c0 ∈ Top, c3 ∈ P(c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c3)), c3 ⊆ c2)
  syl(c0 ∈ Top, (c3 ∈ P(c2)↔ c3 ⊆ c2), c2 ∈ c0)
  topopn(c0, c2)
  elpw2g(c2, c0, c3)

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

}

thm neiint(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
} = {
  bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))))
  3anibar(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2), wb(wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))))))
  isnei(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)))
  rexlimdvaa(hs0, c0, w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3)), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)))
  sstrd(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3), cv(hs0), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3)))))
  simprrl(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))
  adantrrl(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)))
  3adantl2(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c3)), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)))
  ssntr(c0, c3, c2, cv(hs0))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))))
  syl12anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3))), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3), c0), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)), wss(cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3), c3))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3), c0), wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c3, c2))
  ntropn(c0, c3, c2)
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3))), wss(cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3), c3), wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c3, c2))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)))

  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)), wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)), wss(cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3), c3))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3), c1)
  sseq1(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3), c3)

  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)), wss(cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3), c3)))

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c2)→(c3 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1)↔ c1 ⊆((int ` c0)` c3)))

  rexlimdvaa(hs0, c0, (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c2), (c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c3), c1 ⊆((int ` c0)` c3))
  sstrd(c1, ((int ` c0)` c3), hs0, ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c2)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c3))))
  simprrl((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c2), hs0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ hs0, hs0 ⊆ c3)

  ssntr(c0, c3, c2, hs0)
  ex((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c2), c1 ⊆((int ` c0)` c3), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c3)))
  syl12anc(((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c2)∧ c1 ⊆((int ` c0)` c3)), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c3)), ((int ` c0)` c3)∈ c0, c1 ⊆((int ` c0)` c3), ((int ` c0)` c3)⊆ c3)
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c2)∧ c1 ⊆((int ` c0)` c3)), ((int ` c0)` c3)∈ c0, c0 ∈ Top, c3 ⊆ c2)

  simpr((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c2), c1 ⊆((int ` c0)` c3))
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c2)∧ c1 ⊆((int ` c0)` c3)), ((int ` c0)` c3)⊆ c3, c0 ∈ Top, c3 ⊆ c2)
  simpl1(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c2, c3 ⊆ c2, c1 ⊆((int ` c0)` c3))
  simpl3(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c2, c3 ⊆ c2, c1 ⊆((int ` c0)` c3))
  ntrss2(c0, c3, c2)
  rspcev(hs0, ((int ` c0)` c3), c0, (c1 ⊆((int ` c0)` c3)∧((int ` c0)` c3)⊆ c3), (c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c3))
  anbi12d(hs0 =((int ` c0)` c3), c1 ⊆ hs0, hs0 ⊆ c3, c1 ⊆((int ` c0)` c3), ((int ` c0)` c3)⊆ c3)
  sseq2(hs0, ((int ` c0)` c3), c1)
  sseq1(hs0, ((int ` c0)` c3), c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c2))
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ⊆((int ` c0)` c3))
  diff.hs0.c(((int ` c0)` c3))
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ⊆((int ` c0)` c3)∧((int ` c0)` c3)⊆ c3))
}

blocks.name: isneip
blocks.content: The predicate "the class ` N ` is a neighborhood of point ` P ` ". (Contributed by NM, 26-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm isneip(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c1))), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c1))), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)))), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(csn(c1), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)))))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c1))), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(csn(c1), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))))), wss(csn(c1), c2))
  snssi(c1, c2)
  isnei(s0, c0, csn(c1), c2, c3)
  adantl(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)))), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(csn(c1), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))))))
  anbi2d(wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(csn(c1), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)), wa(wss(csn(c1), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)))
  anbi1d(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3), wss(csn(c1), cv(s0)))
  snssg(c1, c2, cv(s0))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: neii1
blocks.content: A neighborhood is included in the topology's base set. (Contributed by NM, 12-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm neii1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wss(c1, c3))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
} = {
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wss(c1, c3), wss(c2, c3))
  neiss2(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  impancom(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c2, c3), wss(c1, c3))
  syl6bi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c2, c3)), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c1, c3), wa(wss(c1, c3), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  isnei(hs0, c0, c2, c3, c1)
  simpl(wss(c1, c3), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm neii1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))→ c1 ⊆ c3)
  ⊣ c3 = ⋃ c0
} = {
  mpd((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)), c1 ⊆ c3, c2 ⊆ c3)
  neiss2(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  impancom(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), c2 ⊆ c3, c1 ⊆ c3)
  syl6bi((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c2 ⊆ c3), c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), c1 ⊆ c3, (c1 ⊆ c3 ∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1))))
  isnei(hs0, c0, c2, c3, c1)
  simpl(c1 ⊆ c3, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: neisspw
blocks.content: The neighborhoods of any set are subsets of the base set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm neisspw(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1), cpw(c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1), cpw(c2), wcel(c0, ctop))
  ex(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c2)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c2))
  neii1(c0, cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  selpw(hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, ctop))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm neisspw(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Top →((nei ` c0)` c1)⊆ P(c2))
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, ((nei ` c0)` c1), P(c2), c0 ∈ Top)
  ex(c0 ∈ Top, hs0 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1), hs0 ∈ P(c2))
  sylibr((c0 ∈ Top ∧ hs0 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1)), hs0 ∈ P(c2), hs0 ⊆ c2)
  neii1(c0, hs0, c1, c2)
  selpw(hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(((nei ` c0)` c1))
  diff.hs0.c(P(c2))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ Top)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: neii2
blocks.content: Property of a neighborhood. (Contributed by NM, 12-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm neii2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1))), wss(c2, cuni(c0)))
  neiss2(c0, c1, c2, cuni(c0))
  impancom(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c2, cuni(c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1))))
  syl6bi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c2, cuni(c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1))), wa(wss(c1, cuni(c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1)))))
  isnei(s0, c0, c2, cuni(c0), c1)
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  simpr(wss(c1, cuni(c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1))))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm neii2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))→ ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpd((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c1)), c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  neiss2(c0, c1, c2, ⋃ c0)
  impancom(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c1)))
  syl6bi((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0), c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c1)), (c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c1))))
  isnei(s0, c0, c2, ⋃ c0, c1)
  eqid(⋃ c0)
  simpr(c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c1)))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
}

blocks.name: neiss
blocks.content: Any neighborhood of a set ` S ` is also a neighborhood of any subset ` R C_ S ` . Similar to Proposition 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.2. (Contributed by FL, 25-Sep-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm neiss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c3)))
} = {
  mpbir2and(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c3)), wss(c1, cuni(c0)), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c3, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2), wss(c1, cuni(c0)))
  neii1(c0, c1, c2, cuni(c0))
  mpd(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2)), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c3, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))))
  neii2(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2), wi(wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c3, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  reximdv(hs0, c0, wss(c3, c2), wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wss(c3, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))
  anim1d(wss(c3, c2), wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wss(c3, cv(hs0)))
  sstr2(c3, c2, cv(hs0))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2)), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c3)), wa(wss(c1, cuni(c0)), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c3, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))))), wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c3, cuni(c0)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2))
  sstrd(c3, cuni(c0), c2, w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2), wss(c2, cuni(c0)))
  neiss2(c0, c1, c2, cuni(c0))
  isnei(hs0, c0, c3, cuni(c0), c1)
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c3, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm neiss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)∧ c3 ⊆ c2)→ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c3))
} = {
  mpbir2and((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)∧ c3 ⊆ c2), c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c3), c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c3 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1)))
  3adant3(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), c3 ⊆ c2, c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  neii1(c0, c1, c2, ⋃ c0)
  mpd((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)∧ c3 ⊆ c2), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c3 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1)), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1)))
  3adant3(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), c3 ⊆ c2, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1)))
  neii2(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), c3 ⊆ c2, (∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1))→ ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c3 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1))))
  reximdv(hs0, c0, c3 ⊆ c2, (c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1), (c3 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1))
  anim1d(c3 ⊆ c2, c2 ⊆ hs0, hs0 ⊆ c1, c3 ⊆ hs0)
  sstr2(c3, c2, hs0)
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)∧ c3 ⊆ c2), (c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c3)↔(c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c3 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1)))), c0 ∈ Top, c3 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  simp1(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), c3 ⊆ c2)
  sstrd(c3, ⋃ c0, c2, (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)∧ c3 ⊆ c2))
  simp3(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), c3 ⊆ c2)
  3adant3(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), c3 ⊆ c2, c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  neiss2(c0, c1, c2, ⋃ c0)
  isnei(hs0, c0, c3, ⋃ c0, c1)
  eqid(⋃ c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c3 ⊆ c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(⋃ c0)
}

blocks.name: ssnei
blocks.content: A set is included in any of its neighborhoods. Generalization to subsets of ~ elnei . (Contributed by FL, 16-Nov-2006.)

blocks.name: elnei
blocks.content: A point belongs to any of its neighborhoods. Property V_iii of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.3. (Contributed by FL, 28-Sep-2006.)

blocks.name: 0nnei
blocks.content: The empty set is not a neighborhood of a nonempty set. (Contributed by FL, 18-Sep-2007.)

blocks.name: neips
blocks.content: A neighborhood of a set is a neighborhood of every point in the set. Proposition 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.2. (Contributed by FL, 16-Nov-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm neips(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wne(c1, emptycls)), wb(wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wne(c1, emptycls), wi(wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0)))))))
  ralrimdv(s0, c1, wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0)))))
  3exp(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0)))))
  syl3an3(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0)))), wss(csn(cv(s0)), c1))
  snssi(cv(s0), c1)
  neiss(c0, c3, c1, csn(cv(s0)))
  3imtr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wne(c1, emptycls)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))))), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wral(s0, c1, wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))))), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), c3)))))
  sylbid(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wne(c1, emptycls)), wral(s0, c1, wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))))), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), c3)))), wa(wss(c3, c2), wral(s0, c1, wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))))))

thm neips(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅)→(c3 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c3 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 }))))
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  impbid((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅), c3 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c3 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 })))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c2, c1 ≠ ∅, (c3 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1)→ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c3 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 }))))

  r19.28zv(s0, c1, c3 ⊆ c2, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c3)))

  elrab(hs2, hs0, c0, hs2 ⊆ c3, hs0 ⊆ c3)

  anbi12d(hs1 = ⋃ { hs2 ∈ c0 | hs2 ⊆ c3 }, c1 ⊆ hs1, hs1 ⊆ c3, c1 ⊆ ⋃ { hs2 ∈ c0 | hs2 ⊆ c3 }, ⋃ { hs2 ∈ c0 | hs2 ⊆ c3 } ⊆ c3)

  anassrs(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c2, s0 ∈ c1, (c3 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 })↔(c3 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c3)))))
  sylan2(c0 ∈ Top, (c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), (c3 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 })↔(c3 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c3)))), s0 ∈ c2)

blocks.name: opnneissb
blocks.content: An open set is a neighborhood of any of its subsets. (Contributed by FL, 2-Oct-2006.)

thm opnneissb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3)), wb(wss(c2, c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3)), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)))
  3imp(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3), wi(wss(c2, c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))))
  exp43(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)))
  mpbir2and(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c2, c1))), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c1, c3), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c2, c1)), wss(c1, c3))
  eltopss(c0, c1, c3)
  ad2ant2l(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3), wss(c2, c1), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))))
  mpanr2(wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c1), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))), wss(c1, c1))
  ssid(c1)
  rspcev(hs0, c1, c0, wa(wss(c2, c1), wss(c1, c1)), wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c1, c1))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  sseq1(cv(hs0), c1, c1)
  ad2ant2r(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3), wss(c2, c1), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wa(wss(c1, c3), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))))))
  isnei(hs0, c0, c2, c3, c1)
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3), wi(wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c2, c1)))
  ex(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c2, c1))
  ssnei(c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wss(c2, c1), wss(c1, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm opnneissb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3)→(c2 ⊆ c1 ↔ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)))
  ⊣ c3 = ⋃ c0
} = {
  impbid((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3), c2 ⊆ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))
  3imp(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ⊆ c3, (c2 ⊆ c1 → c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)))
  exp43(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ⊆ c3, c2 ⊆ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))
  mpbir2and(((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ c0)∧(c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1)), c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), c1 ⊆ c3, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1)))
  adantr((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ c0), (c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), c1 ⊆ c3)
  eltopss(c0, c1, c3)
  ad2ant2l(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ⊆ c3, c2 ⊆ c1, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1)))
  mpanr2(c1 ∈ c0, c2 ⊆ c1, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1)), c1 ⊆ c1)
  ssid(c1)
  rspcev(hs0, c1, c0, (c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ c1), (c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c1, c2 ⊆ hs0, hs0 ⊆ c1, c2 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆ c1)
  sseq2(hs0, c1, c2)
  sseq1(hs0, c1, c1)
  ad2ant2r(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ⊆ c3, c2 ⊆ c1, (c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)↔(c1 ⊆ c3 ∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1)))))
  isnei(hs0, c0, c2, c3, c1)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ⊆ c3, (c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)→ c2 ⊆ c1))
  ex(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), c2 ⊆ c1)
  ssnei(c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: opnssneib
blocks.content: Any superset of an open set is a neighborhood of it. (Contributed by NM, 14-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm opnssneib(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3)), wb(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1))))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3)), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)))
  sylibrd(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3)), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c2)))))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3), wi(wss(c1, c2), wa(wss(c2, c3), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c2))))))
  ex(wa(wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3)), wss(c1, c2), wa(wss(c2, c3), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c2)))))
  jca(wa(wa(wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3)), wss(c1, c2)), wss(c2, c3), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c2))))
  simplr(wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3), wss(c1, c2))
  adantlr(wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3), wss(c1, c2), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c2))))
  rspcev(hs0, c1, c0, wss(c1, c2), wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c2)))
  syl6bbr(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c2)), wss(c1, c2), wa(wss(c1, c1), wss(c1, c2)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c2), wss(c1, c1), wss(c1, c2))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c1, c1)
  sseq1(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  biantrur(wss(c1, c2), wss(c1, c1))
  ssid(c1)
  3adant3(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c2))))))
  syldan(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c2))))), wss(c1, c3))
  eltopss(c0, c1, c3)
  isnei(hs0, c0, c1, c3, c2)
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3), wi(wcel(c2, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wss(c1, c2)))
  ex(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c2, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wss(c1, c2))
  ssnei(c0, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm opnssneib(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3)→(c1 ⊆ c2 ↔ c2 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1)))
  ⊣ c3 = ⋃ c0
} = {
  impbid((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3), c1 ⊆ c2, c2 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1))
  sylibrd((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3), c1 ⊆ c2, c2 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1), (c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c2))))
  3adant1(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ⊆ c3, (c1 ⊆ c2 →(c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c2)))))
  ex((c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3), c1 ⊆ c2, (c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c2))))
  jca(((c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3)∧ c1 ⊆ c2), c2 ⊆ c3, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c2)))
  simplr(c1 ∈ c0, c2 ⊆ c3, c1 ⊆ c2)
  adantlr(c1 ∈ c0, c2 ⊆ c3, c1 ⊆ c2, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c2)))
  rspcev(hs0, c1, c0, c1 ⊆ c2, (c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c2))
  syl6bbr(hs0 = c1, (c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c2), c1 ⊆ c2, (c1 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c1, c1 ⊆ hs0, hs0 ⊆ c2, c1 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆ c2)
  sseq2(hs0, c1, c1)
  sseq1(hs0, c1, c2)
  biantrur(c1 ⊆ c2, c1 ⊆ c1)
  ssid(c1)
  3adant3(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ⊆ c3, (c2 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1)↔(c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c2)))))
  syldan(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ c0, (c2 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1)↔(c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c2)))), c1 ⊆ c3)
  eltopss(c0, c1, c3)
  isnei(hs0, c0, c1, c3, c2)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ⊆ c3, (c2 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1)→ c1 ⊆ c2))
  ex(c0 ∈ Top, c2 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1), c1 ⊆ c2)
  ssnei(c0, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ⊆ c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: ssnei2
blocks.content: Any subset ` M ` of ` X ` containing a neighborhood ` N ` of a set ` S ` is a neighborhood of this set. Generalization to subsets of Property V_i of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.3. (Contributed by FL, 2-Oct-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssnei2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wa(wss(c1, c3), wss(c3, c4))), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)))
  -| wceq(c4, cuni(c0))
} = {
  mpbir2and(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wa(wss(c1, c3), wss(c3, c4))), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c4), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wss(c1, c3), wss(c3, c4))
  adantrr(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wss(c1, c3), wss(c3, c4), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))))
  mpan9(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wss(c1, c3), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))))
  neii2(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  reximdv(hs0, c0, wss(c1, c3), wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3)))
  anim2d(wss(c1, c3), wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cv(hs0), c3))
  com12(wss(c1, c3), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cv(hs0), c3))
  sstr2(cv(hs0), c1, c3)
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wa(wss(c1, c3), wss(c3, c4)), wb(wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wa(wss(c3, c4), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))))))
  syldan(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wb(wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wa(wss(c3, c4), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))))), wss(c2, c4))
  neiss2(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  isnei(hs0, c0, c2, c4, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c1, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ssnei2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))∧(c1 ⊆ c3 ∧ c3 ⊆ c4))→ c3 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))
  ⊣ c4 = ⋃ c0
} = {
  mpbir2and(((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))∧(c1 ⊆ c3 ∧ c3 ⊆ c4)), c3 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), c3 ⊆ c4, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c3)))
  simprr((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)), c1 ⊆ c3, c3 ⊆ c4)
  adantrr((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)), c1 ⊆ c3, c3 ⊆ c4, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c3)))
  mpan9((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)), c1 ⊆ c3, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c3)), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1)))
  neii2(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  reximdv(hs0, c0, c1 ⊆ c3, (c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1), (c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c3))
  anim2d(c1 ⊆ c3, c2 ⊆ hs0, hs0 ⊆ c1, hs0 ⊆ c3)
  com12(c1 ⊆ c3, hs0 ⊆ c1, hs0 ⊆ c3)
  sstr2(hs0, c1, c3)
  adantr((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)), (c1 ⊆ c3 ∧ c3 ⊆ c4), (c3 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)↔(c3 ⊆ c4 ∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c3)))))
  syldan(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), (c3 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)↔(c3 ⊆ c4 ∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c3)))), c2 ⊆ c4)
  neiss2(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  isnei(hs0, c0, c2, c4, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ⊆ c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: neindisj
blocks.content: Any neighborhood of an element in the closure of a subset intersects the subset. Part of proof of Theorem 6.6 of [Munkres] p. 97. (Contributed by NM, 26-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm neindisj(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)), wcel(c4, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3))))), wne(cin(c4, c1), emptycls))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
} = {
  imp43(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)), wcel(c4, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3))), wne(cin(c4, c1), emptycls))
  exp32(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)), wi(wcel(c4, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3))), wne(cin(c4, c1), emptycls)))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)))), wcel(c4, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3))), wne(cin(c4, c1), emptycls), wa(wss(c4, c2), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c4)))))
  syldan(wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1))), wb(wcel(c4, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3))), wa(wss(c4, c2), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c4))))), wcel(c3, c2))
  impr(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)), wcel(c3, c2))
  sseld(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1), c2, wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)))
  clsss3(c0, c1, c2)
  isneip(hs0, c0, c3, c2, c4)
  expimpd(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)))), wss(c4, c2), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c4))), wne(cin(c4, c1), emptycls))
  rexlimdva2(hs0, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)))), wss(c4, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c4)), wne(cin(c4, c1), emptycls))
  mpd(wa(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)))), wss(c4, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wa(wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c4))), wne(cin(c4, c1), emptycls), wne(cin(cv(hs0), c1), emptycls))
  adantrr(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)))), wss(c4, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c4), wne(cin(cv(hs0), c1), emptycls))
  adantllr(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)))), wss(c4, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(hs0), c1), emptycls))
  anassrs(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(hs0), c1), emptycls))
  sylanbr(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c3, cv(hs0))), wne(cin(cv(hs0), c1), emptycls), w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1))))
  3anass(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)))
  clsndisj(c0, c1, c2, c3, cv(hs0))
  ad2antll(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)))), wss(c4, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c4), wi(wne(cin(cv(hs0), c1), emptycls), wne(cin(c4, c1), emptycls)))
  necon3d(cin(cv(hs0), c1), emptycls, cin(c4, c1), emptycls, wss(cv(hs0), c4))
  ex(wss(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cin(c4, c1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), c1), emptycls))
  ssdisj(cv(hs0), c4, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)))), wss(c4, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wne(cin(c4, c1), emptycls))
}

thm neindisj(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧(c3 ∈((cls ` c0)` c1)∧ c4 ∈((nei ` c0)` { c3 })))→(c4 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅)
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
} = {
  imp43(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c2, c3 ∈((cls ` c0)` c1), c4 ∈((nei ` c0)` { c3 }), (c4 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅)
  exp32(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c2, c3 ∈((cls ` c0)` c1), (c4 ∈((nei ` c0)` { c3 })→(c4 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅))
  sylbid((c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈((cls ` c0)` c1))), c4 ∈((nei ` c0)` { c3 }), (c4 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅, (c4 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c3 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c4))))
  syldan(c0 ∈ Top, (c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈((cls ` c0)` c1)), (c4 ∈((nei ` c0)` { c3 })↔(c4 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c3 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c4)))), c3 ∈ c2)
  impr(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c2, c3 ∈((cls ` c0)` c1), c3 ∈ c2)
  sseld(c3, ((cls ` c0)` c1), c2, (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  clsss3(c0, c1, c2)
  isneip(hs0, c0, c3, c2, c4)
  expimpd((c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈((cls ` c0)` c1))), c4 ⊆ c2, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c3 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c4)), (c4 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅)
  rexlimdva2(hs0, c0, ((c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈((cls ` c0)` c1)))∧ c4 ⊆ c2), (c3 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c4), (c4 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅)
  mpd(((((c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈((cls ` c0)` c1)))∧ c4 ⊆ c2)∧ hs0 ∈ c0)∧(c3 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c4)), (c4 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅, (hs0 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅)
  adantrr((((c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈((cls ` c0)` c1)))∧ c4 ⊆ c2)∧ hs0 ∈ c0), c3 ∈ hs0, hs0 ⊆ c4, (hs0 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅)
  adantllr((c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈((cls ` c0)` c1))), c4 ⊆ c2, hs0 ∈ c0, c3 ∈ hs0, (hs0 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅)
  anassrs((c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈((cls ` c0)` c1))), hs0 ∈ c0, c3 ∈ hs0, (hs0 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅)
  sylanbr((c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈((cls ` c0)` c1))), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ hs0), (hs0 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅, (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈((cls ` c0)` c1)))
  3anass(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c2, c3 ∈((cls ` c0)` c1))
  clsndisj(c0, c1, c2, c3, hs0)
  ad2antll((((c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈((cls ` c0)` c1)))∧ c4 ⊆ c2)∧ hs0 ∈ c0), c3 ∈ hs0, hs0 ⊆ c4, ((hs0 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅ →(c4 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅))
  necon3d((hs0 ⋂ c1), emptycls, (c4 ⋂ c1), emptycls, hs0 ⊆ c4)
  ex(hs0 ⊆ c4, (c4 ⋂ c1)= ∅, (hs0 ⋂ c1)= ∅)
  ssdisj(hs0, c4, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈((cls ` c0)` c1)))∧ c4 ⊆ c2))
  diff.hs0.w((c4 ⋂ c1)≠ ∅)
}

blocks.name: opnneiss
blocks.content: An open set is a neighborhood of any of its subsets. (Contributed by NM, 13-Feb-2007.)

blocks.name: opnneip
blocks.content: An open set is a neighborhood of any of its members. (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-2007.)

blocks.name: opnnei
blocks.content: A set is open iff it is a neighborhood of all of its points. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 15-Sep-2009.)

thm opnnei(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Top →(c1 ∈ c0 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 }))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(c0 ∈ Top, (c1 ∈ c0 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 }))), c1 = ∅)
  2thd((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 = ∅), c1 ∈ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 })))
  mpbird((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 = ∅), c1 ∈ c0, ∅ ∈ c0)
  adantr(c0 ∈ Top, c1 = ∅, ∅ ∈ c0)
  0opn(c0)
  adantl(c0 ∈ Top, c1 = ∅, (c1 ∈ c0 ↔ ∅ ∈ c0))
  eleq1(c1, emptycls, c0)
  adantl(c0 ∈ Top, c1 = ∅, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 })))
  rzal(s0, c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 }))
  impbid((c0 ∈ Top ∧ ¬ c1 = ∅), c1 ∈ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 })))
  adantr(c0 ∈ Top, ¬ c1 = ∅, (c1 ∈ c0 → ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 }))))
  ex(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 })))
  ralrimiv(s0, c1, (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ c0), c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 }))
  3expia(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 }))
  opnneip(c0, c1, s0)

  sylan9r(c0 ∈ Top, ¬ c1 = ∅, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 })), c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0, ∃(s0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 })))
  sylbir(¬ c1 = ∅, (∀(s0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 }))→ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 }))), c1 ≠ ∅)
  df-ne(c1, emptycls)
  ex(c1 ≠ ∅, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 })), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 })))
  r19.2z(s0, c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 }))
  rexlimdvw(s0, c1, c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 }), c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  ex(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 }), c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  neii1(c0, c1, { s0 }, ⋃ c0)
  adantr(c0 ∈ Top, ¬ c1 = ∅, (∀(s0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 }))→(c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0 → c1 ∈ c0)))
  com23(c0 ∈ Top, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 })), c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0, c1 ∈ c0)
  ex(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0, (∀(s0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 }))→ c1 ∈ c0))
  3imtr4d((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 })), c1 ∈ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, { s0 } ⊆((int ` c0)` c1)), ((int ` c0)` c1)= c1)
  ex((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, { s0 } ⊆((int ` c0)` c1)), ((int ` c0)` c1)= c1)
  eqssd(((int ` c0)` c1), c1, ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, { s0 } ⊆((int ` c0)` c1))))
  adantr((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, { s0 } ⊆((int ` c0)` c1)), ((int ` c0)` c1)⊆ c1)
  ntrss2(c0, c1, ⋃ c0)
  sylan2br((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, { s0 } ⊆((int ` c0)` c1)), c1 ⊆((int ` c0)` c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s0 ∈((int ` c0)` c1)))

  biimpri(∀(s0 ∈ c1, s0 ∈((int ` c0)` c1)), c1 ⊆((int ` c0)` c1))
  dfss3(s0, c1, ((int ` c0)` c1))

  syldan((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0), s0 ∈ c1, (c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 })↔ { s0 } ⊆((int ` c0)` c1)), { s0 } ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  imp((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0), s0 ∈ c1, { s0 } ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  syl5bi((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0), s0 ∈ c1, { s0 } ⊆ ⋃ c0, { s0 } ⊆ c1)
  snss(s0, c1)
  vex(s0)
  adantl(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0, ({ s0 } ⊆ c1 → { s0 } ⊆ ⋃ c0))
  com12(c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0, { s0 } ⊆ c1, { s0 } ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  sstr2({ s0 }, c1, ⋃ c0)
  3expa(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0, { s0 } ⊆ ⋃ c0, (c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 })↔ { s0 } ⊆((int ` c0)` c1)))
  3com23(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0, { s0 } ⊆ ⋃ c0, (c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` { s0 })↔ { s0 } ⊆((int ` c0)` c1)))
  neiint(c0, { s0 }, ⋃ c0, c1)
  isopn3(c0, c1, ⋃ c0)
  eqid(⋃ c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, (int ` c0), c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cnt, c0)
  diff.cnt.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, ctop)
  diff.ctop.s(s0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c1, ⋃ c0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
}

blocks.name: tpnei
blocks.content: The underlying set of a topology is a neighborhood of any of its subsets. Special case of ~ opnneiss . (Contributed by FL, 2-Oct-2006.)

blocks.name: neiuni
blocks.content: The union of the neighborhoods of a set equals the topology's underlying set. (Contributed by FL, 18-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm neiuni(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wceq(c2, cuni(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
} = {
  eqssd(c2, cuni(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wss(c2, cuni(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1))), wcel(c2, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)))
  tpnei(c0, c1, c2)
  elssuni(c2, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cuni(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), c2), wral(hs0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1), wss(cv(hs0), c2)))
  ralrimiv(hs0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c2)))
  ex(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c2))
  neii1(c0, cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  unissb(hs0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1), c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm neiuni(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)→ c2 = ⋃((nei ` c0)` c1))
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
} = {
  eqssd(c2, ⋃((nei ` c0)` c1), (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  syl((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), c2 ⊆ ⋃((nei ` c0)` c1), c2 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1))
  biimpa(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c2, c2 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1))
  tpnei(c0, c1, c2)
  elssuni(c2, ((nei ` c0)` c1))
  sylibr((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), ⋃((nei ` c0)` c1)⊆ c2, ∀(hs0 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1), hs0 ⊆ c2))
  ralrimiv(hs0, ((nei ` c0)` c1), (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), hs0 ⊆ c2)
  adantr(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c2, (hs0 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1)→ hs0 ⊆ c2))
  ex(c0 ∈ Top, hs0 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1), hs0 ⊆ c2)
  neii1(c0, hs0, c1, c2)
  unissb(hs0, ((nei ` c0)` c1), c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  diff.hs0.c(((nei ` c0)` c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: neindisj2
blocks.content: A point ` P ` belongs to the closure of a set ` S ` iff every neighborhood of ` P ` meets ` S ` . (Contributed by FL, 15-Sep-2013.)

  ntropn(c0, cv(hs0), c2)

  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(c2, c3)), wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c4)))), wss(c4, c2), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c4)))
  neiss2(c0, cv(hs0), c4, c2)

blocks.name: innei
blocks.content: The intersection of two neighborhoods of a set is also a neighborhood of the set. Generalization to subsets of Property V_ii of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.3 for binary intersections. (Contributed by FL, 28-Sep-2006.)

  mpbir2and((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)∧ c3 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)), (c1 ⋂ c3)∈((nei ` c0)` c2), (c1 ⋂ c3)⊆ ⋃ c0, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ c3))))

  syldan(c0 ∈ Top, (c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)∧ c3 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ c3))), (∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆ c1))∧ ∃(hs2 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs2 ∧ hs2 ⊆ c3))))
  anim12dan(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), c3 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆ c1)), ∃(hs2 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs2 ∧ hs2 ⊆ c3)))

  rexlimdva(hs2, c0, ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)∧(c2 ⊆ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆ c1)), (c2 ⊆ hs2 ∧ hs2 ⊆ c3), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c2 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ c3))))

blocks.name: opnneiid
blocks.content: Only an open set is a neighborhood of itself. (Contributed by FL, 2-Oct-2006.)

thm opnneiid(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wcel(c1, c0)))
} = {
  impbid(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wcel(c1, c0))
  ex(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wcel(c1, c0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1))), wcel(c1, c0), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))))
  neii2(hs0, c0, c1, c1)
  rexlimiv(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(c1, c0))
  syl5bir(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c1, cv(hs0)))
  eqss(c1, cv(hs0))
  eleq1a(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  mpii(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wss(c1, c1))
  ssid(c1)

  opnneiss(c0, c1, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c1, c0))
}

thm opnneiid(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Top →(c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1)↔ c1 ∈ c0))
} = {
  impbid(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1), c1 ∈ c0)
  ex(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1), c1 ∈ c0)
  syl((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1)), c1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1)))
  neii2(hs0, c0, c1, c1)
  rexlimiv(hs0, c0, (c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1), c1 ∈ c0)
  syl5bir(hs0 ∈ c0, (c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1), c1 ∈ c0, c1 = hs0)
  eqss(c1, hs0)
  eleq1a(hs0, c0, c1)
  mpii(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ c0, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1), c1 ⊆ c1)
  ssid(c1)
  3exp(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c1))
  opnneiss(c0, c1, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ∈ c0)
}

blocks.name: neissex
blocks.content: For any neighborhood ` N ` of ` S ` , there is a neighborhood ` x ` of ` S ` such that ` N ` is a neighborhood of all subsets of ` x ` . Generalization to subsets of Property V_iv of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.3. (Contributed by FL, 2-Oct-2006.)

thm neissex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  adantrrr(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)))
  3expb(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(c2, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)))
  opnneiss(c0, cv(s0), c2)
  alrimiv(s1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wss(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1)))), wi(wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), cv(s1)))))
  adantrrl(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1), wi(wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), cv(s1)))))
  ex(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1))), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), cv(s1))))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1))), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), cv(s1))), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), cv(s0))), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  simplll(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1))), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), cv(s0))))
  anasss(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), cv(s0))))
  biimpa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wss(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), cv(s0))))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(wss(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(c1, cuni(c0)))

  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)))

  diff.wa.s(s1, wss(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1))
  diff.wss.s(s1, c2, cv(s0))
  diff.wss.s(s1, cv(s0), c1)

thm neissex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))→ ∃(s0 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), ∀(s1,(s1 ⊆ s0 → c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` s1)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  reximssdv(s0, ((nei ` c0)` c2), c0, (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)), ∀(s1,(s1 ⊆ s0 → c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` s1))), (c2 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c1))
  neii2(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  adantlr(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), (s0 ∈ c0 ∧(c2 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c1)), s0 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))
  adantrrr(c0 ∈ Top, s0 ∈ c0, c2 ⊆ s0, s0 ⊆ c1, s0 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))
  3expb(c0 ∈ Top, s0 ∈ c0, c2 ⊆ s0, s0 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))
  opnneiss(c0, s0, c2)
  alrimiv(s1, ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧(c2 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c1))), (s1 ⊆ s0 → c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` s1)))
  adantrrl((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)), s0 ∈ c0, c2 ⊆ s0, s0 ⊆ c1, (s1 ⊆ s0 → c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` s1)))
  ex(((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c1)), s1 ⊆ s0, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` s1))
  syl3anc((((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c1))∧ s1 ⊆ s0), c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` s1), c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` s0), s1 ⊆ s0)
  simplll(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c1), s1 ⊆ s0)
  adantr(((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c1)), s1 ⊆ s0, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` s0))
  anasss((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)), s0 ∈ c0, s0 ⊆ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` s0))
  biimpa(((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))∧ s0 ∈ c0), s0 ⊆ c1, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` s0))
  syl3anc(((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))∧ s0 ∈ c0), (s0 ⊆ c1 ↔ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` s0)), c0 ∈ Top, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  simpll(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), s0 ∈ c0)
  simpr((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)), s0 ∈ c0)
  adantr((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)), s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  neii1(c0, c1, c2, ⋃ c0)
  opnssneib(c0, s0, c1, ⋃ c0)
  eqid(⋃ c0)
  simpr(((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c1)), s1 ⊆ s0)
  neiss(c0, c1, s0, s1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, ctop)
  diff.ctop.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, ((nei ` c0)` c2))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, (nei ` c0), c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cnei, c0)
  diff.cnei.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)), (s0 ∈ c0 ∧(c2 ⊆ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c1)))
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))

  diff.wss.s(s1, c2, s0)
  diff.wss.s(s1, s0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm neipeltop(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wss(c0, c2), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s1, cpw(c2), wral(s0, cv(s1), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(c3, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wss(c0, c2), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(c0, cpw(c2)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))))
  elrab2(s1, c0, c1, cpw(c2), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, cv(s1), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))
  raleqbi1dv(s0, cv(s1), c0, wcel(cv(s1), cfv(c3, cv(s0))), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  eleq1(cv(s1), c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))
  pm5.32ri(wcel(c0, cpw(c2)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wss(c0, c2))
  syl(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c2)), wss(c0, c2)), wcel(c0, universe))
  pm2.61dane(c0, emptycls, wral(s0, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  adantl(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wceq(c0, emptycls), wcel(c0, universe))
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, emptycls), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  0ex()
  eleq1(c0, emptycls, universe)
  sylan(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c0, universe), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c0, universe)))
  ralimi(s0, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))
  biimparc(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c0, universe)), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c0, universe))
  r19.3rzv(s0, c0, wcel(c0, universe))
  elpwg(c0, universe, c2)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c2)
  diff.wral.s(s1, s0, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c3, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

thm neipeltop(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 ↔(c0 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c0 ∈(c3 ` s0))))
  ⊣ c1 = { s1 ∈ P(c2)| ∀(s0 ∈ s1, s1 ∈(c3 ` s0))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ∈ c1, (c0 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c0 ∈(c3 ` s0))), (c0 ∈ P(c2)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c0 ∈(c3 ` s0))))
  elrab2(s1, c0, c1, P(c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c0 ∈(c3 ` s0)), ∀(s0 ∈ s1, s1 ∈(c3 ` s0)))
  raleqbi1dv(s0, s1, c0, s1 ∈(c3 ` s0), c0 ∈(c3 ` s0))
  eleq1(s1, c0, (c3 ` s0))
  pm5.32ri(c0 ∈ P(c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c0 ∈(c3 ` s0)), c0 ⊆ c2)
  syl(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c0 ∈(c3 ` s0)), (c0 ∈ P(c2)↔ c0 ⊆ c2), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  pm2.61dane(c0, emptycls, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c0 ∈(c3 ` s0)), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  adantl(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c0 ∈(c3 ` s0)), c0 = ∅, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  mpbiri(c0 = ∅, c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∅ ∈ 𝕌)
  0ex()
  eleq1(c0, emptycls, universe)
  sylan(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c0 ∈(c3 ` s0)), c0 ≠ ∅, c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c0 ∈ 𝕌))
  ralimi(s0, c0, c0 ∈(c3 ` s0), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, (c3 ` s0))
  biimparc(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c0 ∈ 𝕌), c0 ≠ ∅, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  r19.3rzv(s0, c0, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elpwg(c0, universe, c2)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c2)
  diff.wral.s(s1, s0, c0, c0 ∈(c3 ` s0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, (c3 ` s0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

thm neiptopuni(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cuni(c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s0, cpw(c0), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c0, cpw(cpw(c0))))

blocks.name: neiptopreu
blocks.content: If, to each element ` P ` of a set ` X ` , we associate a set ` ( N `` P ) ` fulfilling Properties V_i, V_ii, V_iii and Property V_iv of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.2. , corresponding to ~ ssnei , ~ innei , ~ elnei and ~ neissex , then there is a unique topology ` j ` such that for any point ` p ` , ` ( N `` p ) ` is the set of neighborhoods of ` p ` . Proposition 2 of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.3. This can be used to build a topology from a set of neighborhoods. Note that ~ innei uses binary intersections whereas Property V_ii mentions finite intersections (which includes the empty intersection of subsets of ` X ` , which is equal to ` X ` ), so we add the hypothesis that ` X ` is a neighborhood of all points. TODO: when ~ df-fi includes the empty intersection, remove that extra hypothesis. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Jan-2018.)

thm neiptopreu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃!(s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0), c1 =(s1 ∈ c0 ↦((nei ` s0)` { s1 }))))
  ⊣ c2 = { s2 ∈ P(c0)| ∀(s1 ∈ s2, s2 ∈(c1 ` s1))}
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c0 → P(P(c0))))
  ⊣ ((((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ s2 ⊆ s3 ∧ s3 ⊆ c0)∧ s2 ∈(c1 ` s1))→ s3 ∈(c1 ` s1))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)→(fi `(c1 ` s1))⊆(c1 ` s1))
  ⊣ (((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ s2 ∈(c1 ` s1))→ s1 ∈ s2)
  ⊣ (((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ s2 ∈(c1 ` s1))→ ∃(s3 ∈(c1 ` s1), ∀(s4 ∈ s3, s2 ∈(c1 ` s4))))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)→ c0 ∈(c1 ` s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
  ⊣ d(s4, c0)
  ⊣ d(s4, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
  ⊣ d(s3, w0)
  ⊣ d(s4, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → ∃!(s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0), c1 =(s1 ∈ c0 ↦((nei ` s0)` { s1 })))), d(s0, s2))
  a1ii((w0 → ∃!(s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0), c1 =(s1 ∈ c0 ↦((nei ` s0)` { s1 })))), d(s0, s4))
  syl3anc(w0, ∃!(s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0), c1 =(s1 ∈ c0 ↦((nei ` s0)` { s1 }))), c2 ∈(TopOn ` c0), c1 =(s1 ∈ c0 ↦((nei ` c2)` { s1 })), ∀(s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0),(c1 =(s1 ∈ c0 ↦((nei ` s0)` { s1 }))→ s0 = c2)))
  eleqtrrd(c2, (TopOn ` c0), (TopOn ` ⋃ c2), w0)
  sylib(w0, c2 ∈(TopOn ` ⋃ c2), c2 ∈ Top)
  neiptoptop(s2, s1, s3, s4, c2, c0, c1, w0)
  toptopon2(c2)
  fveq2d(ctopon, c0, ⋃ c2, w0)
  neiptopuni(s2, s1, s3, s4, c0, c2, c1, w0)
